title: The Only Solution to Culture
description:
As we watch our culture become blander and less cohesive, we need to ask the hardest questions, about distraction and entertainment, about the possibility of participation and how this relates to liturgy as the ultimate word of art. 

From May 2019 Shared Inheritance conference, "Growing in the Likeness of God: Eastern Spirituality in the modern world".

To support this and future conferences, please visit the Shared Inheritance website and make a one-time or recurring donation. For more information, please visit https://www.shared-inheritance.com/ or email them at info@shared-inheritance.com.

Links
